title: MPs should vote to stop this Brexit agony
text:
If Parliament is given another three months it will merely use the time for more dither, delay and confusion

As things stand, the UK is leaving the EU at midnight on Thursday and nothing has happened to change that. The assumptions that it will be delayed once again are almost certainly correct but this can only be done by way of a statutory instrument tabled by the Government. Two previous Brexit dates, March 29 and April 12, were changed in this way; but the resolution amending Oct 31 has not yet been tabled. There is still time, but not much.

Moreover, the EU has not spelled out the nature and duration of the extension that is to be offered; and nor has Boris Johnson said he will accept...
description: If Parliament is given another three months it will merely use the time for more dither, delay and confusion
